articles.title: 24 Things To Make Your Tiny Apartment Feel Bigger
articles.author: Daysha Edewi
articles.summary: The article showcases several space-saving organizational products. These include items like a magnetic stove shelf that attaches without screws, a under-desk laptop holder, and adjustable mug organizers designed to free up cabinet space. These solutions are intended to maximize space in small areas.

articles.title: Meta will sell you refurbished Ray-Ban smart glasses for $76 off - how to find them
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Meta is offering 'Refurbished AI Glasses' for sale. These like-new products are available in original packaging through Meta's store, representing a new product category for the company.

articles.title: L'ange Le Volume blow dryer brush: Is Walmart's $50 discount worth it?
articles.author: Ashley Dill
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a sale on the L'ange Hair Le Volume 2-in-1 Titanium Blow Dryer Brush, reducing the price to $69 from $119. The product is a hot air brush designed to dry and style hair simultaneously, providing volume and shine using titanium barrel and negative ion technology, with custom heat settings and travel-friendly design.

articles.title: Save $300 on a new Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 smartphone for Labor Day
articles.author: Christine Persaud
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing the Galaxy Z Fold7, its newest foldable phone. The phone features a 5-inch outer screen that unfolds into an 8-inch inner screen and incorporates an Armor FlexHinge for durability. The new design minimizes creasing for an improved viewing experience.

articles.title: Save $300 on a new Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 smartphone for Labor Day
articles.author: Christine Persaud
articles.summary: Samsung is offering a $300 discount on the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 for Labor Day. The phone features a 5-inch outer screen and an 8-inch inner screen, along with AI features like Google Gemini Live and AI-powered camera editing.

articles.title: 16-year-old makes history landing Walmart deal
articles.author: Mildred Europa Taylor
articles.summary: Mr. Fresh, a company founded by Joshua Danrich, has launched its 'Mr. Fresh' brand of natural, oil-based air fresheners in Walmart's automotive departments worldwide and online. The product, made with 100% essential oils and available in six different scents, is now accessible to a global audience through Walmart's retail network.

articles.title: 27 Stylish Anthropologie Pieces You'll Love To Wear
articles.author: Gabrielle Moss
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of apparel and accessories, including dresses, pants, skirts, handbags, sweaters, and sneakers. The items are available in various sizes, colors, and prints and sold by Anthro.

articles.title: AIBOT Unveils Multirotor Drones, Tiltwing EVTOL
articles.author: Ben Goldstein
articles.summary: AIBOT, a California startup, has unveiled its product line of small quadcopter drones and tiltwing, multirotor eVTOL aircraft. The company initially planned to develop a passenger-carrying eVTOL air taxi but has pivoted to go to market with these products.

articles.title: Pacdora Redefines Packaging Design with AI-Driven Innovation  Aug. 29, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Pacdora is introducing new AI-powered tools, including an AI background generator and an AI packaging design tool, to streamline packaging design. The AI background generator allows users to easily replace product photo backgrounds, while the AI packaging design tool, powered by 3D rendering technology and OpenAI's GPT-4o, enables the generation of lifelike packaging designs from text prompts.

articles.title: 2 Sisters Became Multimillionaires Making Bath Bombs. Now There Are Chicken Soup and Pickle Versions
articles.author: Moná Thomas
articles.summary: Da Bomb Bath Fizzers is launching their 'Extreme' collection on September 6, featuring unique bath bombs like Chicken Soup and Pickle Bath Bombs. This limited line, inspired by April Fools' Day prank requests, aims to bring a playful and humorous twist to bath time, with other additions including a Hair Ball and Stink Bomb.

articles.title: Arzopa to Showcase Next-Generation Portable Displays and Digital Photo Frames at IFA 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Arzopa, a digital display technology innovator, will showcase its new product lineup at IFA 2025.

articles.title: The Pixel Tablet got a major discount during Amazon's Labor Day sale, but is it still worth buying?
articles.author: Jerry Hildenbrand
articles.summary: The Google Pixel Tablet is reviewed, highlighting its strengths in utilizing Google Gemini AI and its functionality as a smart home hub when docked. It is compared to competitors like Amazon Fire Tablet, Apple iPad and Samsung Galaxy Tab with recommendation on what tablet to choose for different needs. It is also mentioned that Amazon has a discount available for the Google Pixel Tablet for $249.

articles.title: New York Student Caters To Black Students With 'Hello Beauty' Vending Machines
articles.author: Kandiss Edwards
articles.summary: Chantel Francis's company, Hello Beauty, is expanding its beauty supply vending machines across State University of New York (SUNY) campuses. After winning a campus pitch competition, Hello Beauty launched its first vending machine in January 2025 at SUNY Brockport, stocking essentials catering to the Black population, and expanded to SUNY Morrisville by August 2025.

articles.title: There's a secret way to buy Meta Ray-Bans for less than retail (including discontinued styles)
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Meta is launching a Refurbished AI Glasses store, offering like-new products in original packaging. This new sales channel represents an expansion of their product offerings.

articles.title: Can the New Model Y Performance Save Tesla's Sales?
articles.author: Tobias Carroll
articles.summary: Tesla recently launched a new Model Y Performance in Europe. This upgraded version boasts a 0 to 100 km/h acceleration time of 3.5 seconds and a range of 580 km. The launch aims to boost Tesla's sales in the European market, where electric vehicle incentives remain strong and competition from companies like BYD is increasing.

articles.title: Power Generation Nation Launches Optimized Press Release Services for Generator Dealers and Electrical Contractors
articles.author: Power Generation Nation
articles.summary: PGN, a marketing agency, has launched its new Optimized Press Release Services. These services, designed for the power generation industry, combine traditional press release distribution with AI Engine Optimization (AEO) to improve digital visibility and credibility for dealers, contractors, and manufacturers. The releases are crafted to achieve maximum reach and align with conversational platforms like ChatGPT and Google Gemini.

articles.title: Leaker shares Lenovo's radical new concepts: a laptop with a screen that rotates into portrait, and an AI-powered notebook stand
articles.author: Darren Allan
articles.summary: Lenovo is set to unveil 'Project Pivo,' a concept laptop with a rotating screen, and 'Project Ballet,' an AI-powered laptop stand, at the IFA show. 'Project Ballet' utilizes AI to adjust the laptop's positioning based on the user's position relative to the device, while 'Project Pivo' allows the screen to rotate independently of the lid into a portrait orientation.

articles.title: ChatGPT Imitates Google's Interface: The World's Smartest Virtual Search Engine According to GPT Technology
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: OpenAI is extending ChatGPT with internet search capabilities to compete with Google. ChatGPT now offers direct answers, web browsing integration and source citation. These updates represents a significant shift in how users access information.

articles.title: New Zellers store to open in Edmonton as the brand makes another comeback
articles.author: Canadian Press
articles.summary: Zellers is making a comeback with its first new store set to open in Edmonton next week. The new Edmonton location is the only Zellers store opening for now across Leyad's portfolio of retail space. The store will initially offer clothing and home goods.

articles.title: These are the 4 most bloated Windows apps (and what to use instead)
articles.author: Ben Stegner
articles.summary: Microsoft launched PC Manager in 2024 as a tool to optimize systems. PC Manager includes features for RAM cleanup, security scans, storage management, and app management. It also has a restore panel to revert settings to defaults, pushing Microsoft tools like Bing in Edge.

articles.title: I put the Litter-Robot 4 to the test — is this self-cleaning litter box worth the $1,249 price tag?
articles.author: Rick Mele
articles.summary: Whisker launched Litter-Robot 4, a self-cleaning litter box priced at $1,249, which automates litter scooping using weight sensors and a cleaning cycle triggered after the cat exits.  The Litter-Robot 4 also provides real-time updates on litter box usage, waste levels, and cat weight via a built-in scale and companion app. For an additional $175, Whisker offers an automated litter dispenser, LitterHopper, for a more hands-off experience.

articles.title: Is the Future of Advertising Going Through Chatgpt? What Industry Must Anticipate
articles.summary: ChatGPT is emerging as a new competitive field for brands. Companies are being challenged by this evolving landscape.

articles.title: IBC: Vionlabs To Launch New AI Application Layer
articles.author: TVNC Staff
articles.summary: Vionlabs has launched a new application layer that complements its AI models, streamlining workflows for media and entertainment firms. This product offers features such as AI-Powered Smartlists, Creative Batch Automation, Collaborative Workflow and Version Testing and Comparison, enhancing content discovery and marketing processes. It will be showcased at IBC 2025.

articles.title: Editing the Machines: Proofreading AI-Generated Content May Become a New Career Path
articles.author: Provided Amber Smith
articles.summary: The article highlights the rise of AI writing and editing tools and their impact on content creation. Tools like AIDetector, PortraitPal, Grammarly, QuillBot, Surge Graph, AI Rewrite by Evernote and Jasper are mentioned as aids for human editors to check for AI content.  These tools help rewrite and polish content within platforms like Evernote for smoother editing.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 review: Major update adds spooky AI feature
articles.author: Steve Hogarty
articles.summary: Google has launched the Pixel 10 and Pixel 10 Pro, featuring the new Tensor G5 chip for enhanced AI capabilities, upgraded cameras with up to 100x ProRes zoom, and Android 16. The Pixel 10 introduces Pixelsnap magnetic charging, improved speakers, and a brighter display, offering a premium Android experience with a focus on AI-driven features like Magic Cue.

articles.title: Project Marvel: A chat with San Antonio Councilwoman Sukh Kaur
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers streaming of its content via the KENS 5 app. Users can access KENS 5 streaming services on their phones through the KENS 5 application.

articles.title: Tesla releases Model Y Performance in Europe — will it staunch the bleeding?
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Tesla is introducing a new performance version of its Model Y crossover in the European market. This variant aims to increase the company's sales in Europe and features new, high-density battery cells.

articles.title: The Ultimate $17 Gadget for Easy Shower TV Viewing
articles.summary: A $17 waterproof phone pouch is introduced as a solution for "Shower TV," allowing users to watch content on their smartphones while showering. Key features include universal compatibility, IPX8 waterproof rating, high touchscreen responsiveness, and secure seals. Mounting options include suction cups, adhesive mounts, and shower caddies.

articles.title: SingPost looking to launch low-cost alternative for public to send parcels to the US
articles.author: CNA
articles.summary: SingPost is planning to launch a new low-cost parcel delivery service to the US, starting as early as next week. This new service will offer delivery starting from S$11.40, and is initially available only for corporate accounts.

articles.title: Experience luxury redefined in the 2025 Lincoln Navigator Black Label
articles.author: USA TODAY Staff
articles.summary: Lincoln is launching the 2025 Navigator Black Label. The vehicle represents a redefined luxury experience.

articles.title: South Cheshire laundry shop purchased by local family-run business
articles.author: Ryan Parker
articles.summary: Sunrise Laundry acquired XL Cleaning Services and plans to introduce GreenClean, a modern alternative to dry cleaning called wet cleaning. They will also offer home delivery and collection services using their new electric vehicle "Evie", introduce a loyalty scheme, linen hire, and bed linen pressing services to local customers.

articles.title: Ready to elevate your shower routine? Molton Brown's Labor Day sale takes 25% off everything - from iconic scents to luxe body washes
articles.author: Julia Remillard
articles.summary: Molton Brown is having a Labor Day sale, offering a 25% discount on almost all of their products. The sale includes body washes like Coastal Cypress & Sea Fennel and Flora Luminare, hair care, hand soaps, and home scents. These products are being offered at reduced prices for a limited time.

articles.title: Ready to elevate your shower routine? Molton Brown's Labor Day sale takes 25% off everything - from iconic scents to luxe body washes
articles.author: Julia Remillard
articles.summary: Molton Brown is having a Labor Day sale, offering 25% off on their products, including body washes, hair care, hand soaps, and home scents. The sale includes popular scents like Coastal Cypress & Sea Fennel.

articles.title: This little-known beauty outlet sells reduced Dyson Airwraps and Airstraits
articles.author: Josie O'Brien
articles.summary: BrandAlley is offering refurbished Dyson hair tools like the Airwrap, Supersonic Hair Dryer, and Airstrait at discounts up to 35% off. These Dyson Renewed tools are inspected, serviced, and tested to meet quality standards, providing the same experience as new ones with potential minor cosmetic imperfections. This allows customers to purchase Dyson products at a lower cost.

articles.title: This 'super efficient' cordless vacuum is usually $500 on Amazon, but it's on sale for under $150 (save 73%!)
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: MQDXE has launched a Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, featuring powerful suction, a 55-minute runtime, an anti-tangle brush, and HEPA filters. Available on Amazon Canada, the vacuum is discounted by 73%, making it available for under $150, with users praising its build quality, LED-lit cleaning, and lightweight design.

articles.title: Show HN: Website to WhatsApp Agent in under 1 min
articles.summary: Wassist.app has launched a WhatsApp agent product. This new service transforms websites into customer support agents directly on WhatsApp, leveraging LLMs for customer interaction.

articles.title: 7-Eleven Malaysia Unveils CAFé by 7-Eleven With 'Rasa Premium, Harga Berbaloi' This Merdeka
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: 7-Eleven Malaysia launched the 'Rasa Premium, Harga Berbaloi' campaign to promote its CAFé by 7-Eleven concept. The campaign includes the introduction of new menu items like the Black Pepper Chicken Burger, 7Meals (hot meal at RM9.90), and 7Savers (mix-and-match combos), along with a 'Buy Any Coffee, Free 1 Iced Latte' promotion.

articles.title: These Young Black Geniuses are Game-Changers in Business, Tech, and More
articles.author: Asheea Smith
articles.summary: Mikaila Ulmer created Me & the Bees Lemonade, a national lemonade brand, inspired by her passion for bees and environmental sustainability. Maya Penn founded Maya's Ideas, an eco-friendly fashion brand emphasizing sustainability. Alexis Williams launched Police Brutality Resources (PBR) and Softwear by Lex, a sustainable fashion brand.

articles.title: GTA Online just got a survival horror mode in Cayo Perico Zombie Survival
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Rockstar unveiled a new zombie-survival challenge in Grand Theft Auto Online. This new feature introduces a new gameplay experience for players within the existing online platform.

articles.title: Lenovo Unveils Innovative Pivot Screen Laptop at IFA: A Bold New Design Feature
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Lenovo is launching the 'Project Nova' laptop featuring a 360-degree pivot screen at IFA 2025. The laptop has pre-order starting in November 2025 and will be available from December 2025, with price expected to be around $1,599. It features a 14-inch OLED touchscreen, up to 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processor and up to 32GB LPDDR5 RAM.

articles.title: 100,000 Russians Prefer Content Writing Over Virtual Assistance
articles.summary: Upwork, Fiverr, and ProBlogger Job Board connect Russian writers directly with international clients. These platforms allows Russian writers to offer translation services and content localization for international markets. Demand for Russian content writers is high in niches such as IT, Technology, Finance, Investment, Travel, and Tourism.

articles.title: Samsung Z Fold 7
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a new smartphone designed to function as both a phone and a tablet. This device is presented as an innovative product that redefines the smartphone experience.

articles.title: Pacdora Redefines Packaging Design with AI-Driven Innovation
articles.author: PACDORA PTE. LTD
articles.summary: Pacdora is preparing to introduce a fully AI-powered, end-to-end solution for design and marketing, designed to make packaging creation faster, smarter, and more accessible globally. This major step forward expands on their existing suite of AI tools and aims to strengthen their presence in the packaging design industry.

articles.title: Amazon has a five-star hanging hamper that gets your clothes off the floor
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: KINGSUSLAY Store offers the XL Hanging Laundry Hamper Bag on Amazon, featuring a 3-in-1 design for storing clothes pre-wash. The extra-large, durable hamper has tear-resistant, waterproof fabric, hooks for hanging, a wide mouth, a front pocket, and a zipper at the bottom for dispensing clothes.

articles.title: 35 Products That Work Like Magic August 2025
articles.author: Jordan Grigsby
articles.summary: The article features new product releases from various companies.  Eos Vanilla Cashmere Lip Butter, Cezred's detangling spray, and hair and scalp balm are launching new products in the beauty space, while Swiffer introduces a Power Mop kit. Redken is launching Extreme Length Shampoo with Biotin.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Launched In India: Check Price, Specifications, Offers And More
articles.author: Before Content
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Book 5 in India, touting it as their most affordable AI-powered laptop. The Galaxy Book 5 features Intel Core Ultra processors, a 15.6-inch Full HD display, and AI features like AI Photo Remaster and Circle to Search. It is available in four variants, with prices starting at Rs 77,990.

articles.title: Gavin Newsom Trolls Trumpworld
articles.author: Political Wire
articles.summary: Gov. Gavin Newsom's team unveiled the 'Patriot Shop' merchandise on Sunday. The merchandise generated approximately $300,000 in sales on its first day.

articles.title: Experts Say Your Phone Screen Is Nasty With Acne-Causing Bacteria. This Handy Device Is A Perfect Solve.
articles.summary: PhoneSoap, a device utilizing UV-C light for sanitizing devices, is presented as a solution to kill bacteria and viruses on phones and other personal items. The device offers 360-degree disinfection in 10 minutes and includes USB ports for charging. Reviews highlight the device's effectiveness and its potential as an alternative to chemical cleaners.

articles.title: BMW X5: 7 things you ought to know about the new variants. Take a look…
articles.author: Ryan Paul Massey
articles.summary: BMW has updated its X5 SUV in India with new variants, offering more choices in engines, features, and design. The updated BMW X5 includes added digital features and off-road capability.

articles.title: AVAILABLE NOW: Samsung Galaxy Book5 With Intel Core Ultra Processors In India, Here's How Power Meets AI Innovation!
articles.author: Aishwarya Samant
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Book5 laptop, featuring AI capabilities like AI Photo Remaster and Copilot with Hot Key. The laptop boasts a 15.6-inch Full HD anti-glare display, Intel Core Ultra 5 and Core Ultra 7 processors, improved graphics performance, and long battery life. It is available in India through Samsung's website, exclusive stores, authorized retailers, and online portals, with a starting price of ₹77,990 and various offers like cashback and EMI options.

articles.title: Hello, Baby-Soft Skin! These Are the Best Razors, Shaving Kits and Creams for Precision Starting at $4
articles.author: Lauryn Jiles
articles.summary: Gillette introduces a 12-pack of Foamy Regular Shaving Cream, while Proraso offers Shaving Soap for a close shave. Skintimate presents Skin Therapy Shave Gel for moisturizing, and Tree Hut features Bare Moisturizing Shave Oil with a tropical scent. Gillette also offers Sensor3 Sensitive Men's Razors, and Amazon Basics provides a Razor Set with replaceable blades.

articles.title: Hello, Baby-Soft Skin! These Are the Best Razors, Shaving Kits and Creams for Precision Starting at $4
articles.author: Lauryn Jiles
articles.summary: Gillette offers a 12-pack of Foamy Regular Shaving Cream. Proraso sells Shaving Soap. Skintimate provides Skin Therapy Shave Gel for moisturizing. Tree Hut offers Bare Moisturizing Shave Oil. Aveeno offers Therapeutic Shave Gel. Gillette offers Sensor3 Sensitive Men's Razors. Amazon Basics sells a Five-Blade Razor Set. Philips Norelco provides Shaver 2400 Series. Billie sells Disposable Razors. Harry's offers a Shaving Kit. Dollar Shave Club provides the Total Package Kit. Phillips Norelco offers 13-Piece All-In-One Trimmer Set. Veet offers Professional Hair Remover Cream. SoftSheen-Carson offers Magic Razorless Shaving Cream. Nair offers Men's Hair Removal Body Cream.

articles.title: LG, Samsung to unveil new robot vacuum models at IFA
articles.author: 유목민의 시그널리포트
org: Korean Agency for Technology and Standards
articles.summary: LG Electronics and Samsung Electronics are set to introduce new robot vacuum models at IFA 2025. LG will unveil the Hidden Station and Objet Station models, featuring steam-cleaning functions and space-efficient designs, while Samsung will debut its Bespoke AI Jet Bot Steam focusing on steam cleaning and cybersecurity.

articles.title: MG ZS Pro lands in South Africa to rival Jolion, Corolla Cross: pricing and features revealed
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: MG Motor has introduced the MG ZS Pro, a new compact SUV, to the South African market. The ZS Pro is available in two variants: the 1.5T Comfort retailing at R397,600 and the 1.5T Luxury coming in at R431,500. The ZS Pro is larger than the existing ZS model and features a boot volume of 443 litres.

articles.title: Weekly Recap: 14 Consumer Press Releases You Need to See
articles.author: News Provided By
articles.summary: Red Cross x PEANUTS® launched the return of their t-shirts. HI-CHEW® announced new Halloween treats. Jersey Mike's released commercials featuring Eli Manning and Danny Devito.

articles.title: Netflix drops trailer for chilling thriller that's One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest meets Fargo
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Netflix released the trailer for its new mystery thriller series, Wayward. This marks the introduction of new entertainment content to the platform's service offerings.

articles.title: 39 Incredibly Useful Products
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: A popular, nonaerosol dry shampoo powder infused with biotin, black ginseng, and root-boosting powder is introduced for easy hair refreshment. A dairy-free Yonanas fruit soft serve maker lets you create custom ice cream or sorbet. A spray containing hypochlorous acid functions as a toner, facial mist, and treatment for eczema and acne.

articles.title: Huawei previews its second-generation tri-fold phone
articles.summary: Huawei is preparing to launch its second-generation tri-fold smartphone, the Mate XTs, in China, with pre-order registrations already open. The Mate XTs features a familiar design with a new white-and-gold color, potential stylus support, and a Kirin 9020-series processor. Samsung is also expected to release its own tri-fold device, potentially named the Galaxy Z Trifold, before the end of the year.

articles.title: Demand AI Expands Global Footprint with Hong Kong Launch, Its 8th Office in Under a Year  Aug. 29, 2025 09:00
articles.summary: Demand AI has launched its Hong Kong operations, marking its 8th global office. The company's flagship platform, Amplifye.AI, utilizes AI-driven chat and dynamic content to provide higher-quality leads and insights, transforming business-customer engagement.

articles.title: Beauty brand launches AI decoder to analyse skin, recommend solutions
articles.author: Pelumi Bolawa
articles.summary: Nuban Cares, a beauty brand, has launched an AI skin decoder application designed to analyze skin and recommend treatment products. This application was unveiled at the 17th Lagos Make-Up Fair and aims to democratize skincare access across Nigeria by providing AI-driven recommendations for skin issues and appropriate products.

articles.title: When AI buys from AI, who do we trust?
articles.author: Carrie Ryan
articles.summary: OpenAI plans to integrate a checkout system into ChatGPT, enabling seamless purchases within the platform. This allows consumers to complete transactions without visiting a separate website. AI agents are expected to redefine how consumers discover products and interact with brands, impacting e-commerce and personalization.

articles.title: Samsung Launches Most Affordable Galaxy Book5, Bringing Accessible AI-Powered Computing to India
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the new Samsung Galaxy Book5 in India, the latest addition to their premium laptop series. This model emphasizes performance, AI features, and a portable design, making it suitable for students and working professionals who travel. The Galaxy Book5 offers AI features and long battery life.

articles.title: Novacore Innovations: Revolutionizing India's AI Landscape with GPU Cloud Platform
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Novacore Innovations has launched India's first GPU cloud platform, utilizing NVIDIA's Blackwell servers. The platform aims to provide scalable and cost-effective AI solutions to startups and enterprises in India, the U.S., and the Middle East. This initiative is supported by a ₹44.6 crore financing round led by Rashi Fincorp and will deploy their first Blackwell cluster in Hyderabad.

articles.title: Samsung rolls out the Galaxy Book5 and integrates AI for improved efficiency
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Book5 laptop on August 29, featuring an Intel Ultra Core processor and AI-driven capabilities. The laptop includes features like AI Photo Remaster and Copilot and starts at Rs 77,990. It is now available for purchase through Samsung's website and other retailers.

articles.title: Simmons announced on the 29th that it will hold a pop-up event for "Beautyrest Ⅹ N32" at the central..
articles.author: Kim Hyejin
articles.summary: Simmons is holding a pop-up event to showcase its "Beautyrest Ⅹ N32" mattress collection, including the "Beautyrest Centennial Edition" frame and the "N32 Motion Bed" with safety features and app control. The event also features the "N32 Small" premium pet mattress and the "N32 Foam Mattress" with improved foam technology. Customers can consult sleep kiosks and receive purchase benefits during the event.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Londonderry students brace for new cellphone policies
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile is recognized as America's best mobile network in the US, following investments in its network from big cities to small towns. BSP Trans, based in Londonderry, improved operations using the FACTS transportation management system, enhancing efficiency and customer service across its six terminals in New England.

articles.title: Taapsee Pannu offers trusted care with a modern touch in Nivea's new ad
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Nivea India has launched its newly formulated Nivea Body Milk, featuring global ambassador Taapsee Pannu. The body lotion is enriched with 100 percent pure Hyaluronic Acid, providing up to 72 hours of moisturisation. The lightweight and fast-absorbing formula aims to deliver long-lasting body care without leaving a sticky residue.

articles.title: Don't let laundry time wash away family time
articles.author: Brand Talk
articles.summary: Surf launched the Grand Laba Day in the Philippines, offering free laundry services and Surf products to families. This initiative promotes Surf Ultra Power Liquid, which is available in supermarkets and sari-sari stores nationwide, and is designed to provide a superior washing machine clean, saving time on handwashing.

articles.title: Simmons, a sleep brand, announced on the 29th that it will hold a pop-up event for "Beautyrest X N32..
articles.author: Lee Yu-Jin
articles.summary: Simmons is holding a pop-up event to showcase its Beautyrest mattress line and the N32 Motion Bed, which was launched in June. The N32 Motion Bed includes features like safety sensors, an app for automatic modes, and charging ports. The pop-up event allows customers to experience these products and receive sleep counseling.

articles.title: Aldi targets Guinness sales with stout launch
articles.author: William Dodds
articles.summary: Aldi is launching Mulligan's Stout in a 4x440ml pack across UK stores starting September 8, 2025. Priced at £4.99 per four-pack, it's set to be cheaper than Guinness multipacks. Mulligan's Stout has already received positive reviews during regional trials.

articles.title: Android 17 ‘Cinnamon Bun' codename revealed; stable rollout likely June 2026: Report
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is developing Android 17, codenamed 'Cinnamon Bun,' with an expected stable release around June 2026. Early developer previews are anticipated in November 2025, following a pattern similar to Android 16's release cycle. The major SDK release is expected in Q2 2026, with a minor update in Q4 2026.

articles.title: This is what Huawei's new triple-fold phone will look like
articles.summary: Huawei is set to launch its second-generation tri-fold smartphone, the Mate XTs, in China on September 4. Pre-reservations are now open for the device, which features stylus support, a new white color option with gold accents, up to 16GB RAM and 1TB storage, Harmony OS 5.1, a 5,600mAh battery, and a 50MP main camera. The Mate XTs will be available in black, red, white, and hibiscus purple.

articles.title: realme set to launch realme 15T under 20K with Ultra-Premium Design, 7000mAh Titan Battery, and Segment-First 50MP Dual AI Cameras
articles.author: Neelesh
articles.summary: realme is launching the realme 15T smartphone on September 2nd. The realme 15T features a slim design, a 7000mAh battery, and 50MP front and rear AI cameras. The phone will be available in Flowing Silver, Silk Blue, and Suit Titanium.

articles.title: Culina Kuala Lumpur's Special Merdeka Menu Highlights Fresh Ingredients & Local Flavours [Review]
articles.author: Adeline Leong
articles.summary: Culina KL introduced a new seasonal menu 'A Celebration of Local Flavours' in conjunction with Merdeka Day. The menu, available until 30 September 2025, features dishes like Grilled Sabah Sea Prawn Spaghetti, Beef Satay Spaghetti, and Sambal Ortiz Anchovy Pizza.

articles.title: JYSK network expansion: New points of sale across Greece
articles.summary: JYSK is opening two new stores in Thiva and Chrysoupoli, Kavala, expanding its physical presence to 68 stores in Greece. The company aims to open five more stores by August 2025 and is developing its online store and B2B sales.

articles.title: I tested the Acer Aspire 14 AI (2025) and couldn't believe how long its battery ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Acer promises the Aspire 14 AI (2025) will feature advanced capabilities designed to assist with daily tasks. The focus of the article is to determine whether these features meet expectations.

articles.title: I gamed for days on the Acer Nitro V 15 Intel, and its 1080p performance ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Acer's Nitro V 15 Intel laptop is being evaluated for its performance relative to its budget price. The question is raised about potential compromises made to achieve this price point.

articles.title: EDITORIAL: Newsom shows how to lose businesses and insult entrepreneurs
articles.author: Las Vegas Review-Journal
articles.summary: Bed Bath & Beyond opened its first location since filing bankruptcy and plans to debut hundreds of new physical locations. However, the company decided not to open or operate retail stores in California due to overregulation and high costs.

articles.title: Blazing Fast & Secure Web Hosting � 30% Off Recurring Discount This Week! 🔥
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: The service features ultra-fast NVMe SSD storage, offering up to 20x faster performance, complemented by LiteSpeed + LSCache & Redis for enhanced efficiency. It includes cPanel & Softaculous for easy installs, JetBackup for data protection, and cPGuard Security for proactive malware detection.

articles.title: 雲頂新耀2025上半年營收增長48%，預計全年營收16-18億
articles.author: 新浪網
org: 小米集團公關部總經理王化今日在微博發文稱，#
articles.summary: Yunding Xinyao released their mid-year report with revenue of 446 million yuan. NIO announced it will fully connect the Sichuan-Tibet charging routes this year. Xiaopeng released its AI technologies at the Chengdu Auto Show. Xiaomi showed its limited edition SU7. Pop Mart launched 'mini LABUBU'. SAIC Audi showed their models. Letao displayed their booth and Cambricon released its stock trading risk announcement. Dell released Q2 financial report.

articles.title: Third SUV added as MG prices new ZS Pro
articles.author: Charl Bosch
articles.summary: MG officially debuted the ZS Pro in South Africa, a step-up from the ZS model. The ZS Pro is available in Comfort and Luxury models, both powered by a 1.5-litre turbocharged engine. Prices range from R397 600 for the Comfort CVT to R431 500 for the Luxury CVT, including a five-year warranty and service plan.

articles.title: Huawei Launches Ultra-Large SSDs to Meet Soaring AI Data Demands-钛媒体官方网站
articles.summary: Huawei has launched a new OceanDisk line of solid-state drives (SSDs) with a capacity of 245 terabytes, targeting AI computing storage bottlenecks. The OceanDisk EX, SP, and LC series are designed for heavy AI workloads in sectors like finance, healthcare, and autonomous driving. Huawei aims to reduce reliance on foreign suppliers and reinforce its role as a full-stack provider of AI infrastructure.

articles.title: 40 Startup Ideas to Inspire Your Next Big Business Venture
articles.author: Megan Mckinzie
articles.summary: The article presents numerous startup ideas spanning various sectors, including tech, AI, healthcare, sustainability, and travel. These ideas range from AI-powered presentation building and drone meal delivery to eco-friendly home rental platforms and niche podcasts, offering a wide array of potential new products and services for entrepreneurs to explore and develop.

articles.title: Huawei Mate XTs Trifold set to steal the spotlight on September 4 ahead of Samsung and Apple launches
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Huawei is launching its next-generation tri-fold smartphone, the Mate XTs, on September 4, 2025. The Mate XTs, a successor to the original Mate XT, features stylus support, a Z-fold mechanism, and a continuous OLED display, and will run on HarmonyOS 5.1. Huawei is expected to release the Mate XTs at the price of around $2,000.

articles.title: Sinsayouramdan's ‘EOT': An AI Stylist Offering Personalized Fashion Services.
articles.summary: Sinsayouramdan Co., Ltd. has launched 'EOT', an AI-powered style recommendation platform providing personalized fashion services. The company is also developing 'Rondi AI', a new platform which will analyze user movements from videos and provide feedback along with suitable apparel recommendations. Sinsayouramdan plans to expand globally with these platforms.

articles.title: Demand AI Expands Global Footprint with Hong Kong Launch, Its 8th Office in Under a Year
articles.author: 美通社
org: Credit Connect Debt Issuance Fund Pty Ltd
articles.summary: Demand AI launched its Hong Kong operations and is expanding its Amplifye.AI platform. The platform merges AI-driven chat with dynamic content, aiming to transform how businesses connect with buyers by delivering higher-quality leads and sharper insights.

articles.title: SPC's new drink
articles.author: Geoff Adams
articles.summary: SPC Global introduced a new suite of drinks designed for the wellness beverage market.

articles.title: Domestic Worker Builds Business, Challenges SA Icon
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Yaya's Rusks, a new product by Nelia Ngulube, is rapidly gaining popularity in South Africa due to effective social media marketing. The product launch was fueled by an Instagram post, demonstrating the power of direct-to-consumer sales. To manage the growing demand, Yaya's Rusks partnered with Mamamaca's, a small food business, to leverage infrastructure and expertise.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A's Mega Hawlucha is a Good Exception to One Rule
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Game Freak is planning additions for Mega Evolution in the upcoming release of 'Pokemon Legends: Z-A'. The update marks the long-awaited return of this feature.

articles.title: Roborock's Anniversary Blowout Sale Includes $1,000 Off the Incredible Saros Z70 Robot Vacuum
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Roborock is celebrating its 11th birthday by offering upgrades to the world's first mass-produced robot vacuum, which features an intelligent robotic arm. These upgrades are part of 'killer deals' offered by the company.

articles.title: MG ZS Pro lands in South Africa to rival Jolion, Corolla Cross: pricing and features revealed
articles.author: Independent online
articles.summary: MG has introduced the MG ZS Pro compact SUV in South Africa. This new model joins the existing MG ZS, which continues as a more affordable option. The MG ZS Pro expands MG's product range in the South African market, after the recent introduction of MG3 hatchback.

articles.title: Why are Switch 2 dev kits so hard to get?
articles.author: Games Industry
articles.summary: Nintendo's Switch 2 is being introduced at a fast pace.

articles.title: Realme showcases massive 15,000mAh battery phone with up to 4 day backup on a single charge
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: Realme has unveiled a concept phone. The phone features a groundbreaking 15,000mAh battery.

articles.title: Save $300 on a new Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 smartphone for Labor Day
articles.author: Usatoday
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable smartphone. This phone combines a compact design with a larger screen, functioning as both a traditional phone and a small tablet.

articles.title: Faster Swasticar to blitz Europe
articles.summary: Tesla is implied to be releasing a facelifted version of the Model Y Performance. This suggests an updated model with potential improvements or design changes.
